rules: Rule1: Either the conservation project has funding approved or the conservation project receives emergency funding.

Rule2: Whenever the conservation project receives emergency funding, if it is not the case that the electronic device being connected to the network implies that either the electronic device is transmitting data to the base station or, under the condition that the forest area does not have good weather, the artwork is not visible from the observation point, then research data is lost.
Rule3: Under the condition that the research team has returned, then if the research data is recovered, the field study is mission successful.
Rule4: Provided that the research team has submitted the report, then the research team has returned.
Rule5: Either the scientist is studying animal behavior or, if the forest area does not have good weather, then the research team is located in the forest.
Rule6: If the camera trap is installed on the platform, then it is recording data about wildlife.
Rule7: Either the camera trap is installed on the platform or the scientist is not studying animal behavior.

Rule8: Whenever the electronic device is powered on, then either it is transmitting data to the base station or, provided that the forest area does not have good weather, the artwork is not visible from the observation point.
Rule9: Either the electronic device is powered on or it is connected to the network.
Rule10: If it is not the case that funding approval for the conservation project implies that the research data analysis is complete, then the conservation project is cancelled.
Rule11: Provided that it is not the case that funding approval for the conservation project implies that the research data analysis is complete, then the conservation project is not cancelled.
Rule12: If it is not the case that either the equipment is operational or the research site is not accessible, then the research data is recovered.

Rule13: Provided that it is not the case that the electronic device being connected to the network implies that either it is transmitting data to the base station or, whenever the forest area does not have good weather, the artwork is not visible from the observation point, then research data is not lost.
Rule14: Under the condition that the forest area does not have good weather, then the research site is accessible.
Rule15: Whenever the forest area does not have good weather, then the artwork is visible from the observation point.
facts: Fact1: The research team has submitted the report.
Fact2: It is not the case that the research team is located in the forest.
Fact3: Research data is not analysis complete.
Fact4: The equipment is not operational.
Fact5: The field study is not mission successful.
Fact6: The camera trap is not recording data about wildlife.
Fact7: The electronic device is not transmitting data to the base station.

question: The forest area has good weather.
